question: With the sun ______ at its center, emitting warmth and light, and planets gracefully pirouetting in its cosmic ballet, the solar system is not only the home to our Earth but also holds mysteries and wonders waiting to be unveiled.
after: at its center, emitting warmth and light, and planets gracefully pirouetting in its cosmic ballet, the solar system is not only the home to our Earth but also holds mysteries and wonders waiting to be unveiled.
